periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. South wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 38, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Partly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 8am and 10am. Partly sunny, with a high near 50. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 31. West northwest wind 0 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 61. South wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. South wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. South wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 66. Southwest wind 18 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 1am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly cloudy, with a low around 35. West wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers before 7am. Sunny, with a high near 56. West northwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 36. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. South wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
